rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0070
rows.name:
We wanted to ask...
Do you know a woman by the name of Kylie?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0140
rows.name:
Before, one time Omomo was picking veggies,
and was attacked by wild critters, like today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0150
rows.name:
Omomo wanted to flee,
but Omomo no longer sprightly like used to be...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0160
rows.name: So Omomo trip on face and take bad tumble instead of flee.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0170
rows.name: Just as life flash before eyes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0180
rows.name:
friend Kylie suddenly show up, and bash
whole pack of critters squarely on heads.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0190
rows.name:
She carry Omomo back to hut,
and even apply dressings to wounds of Omomo...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0200
rows.name:
And since then, periodically visit here
to check up on Omomo's well-being.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0210
rows.name: Wow, all that? She's very kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0220
rows.name: Heart of Kylie is soft like dough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0230
rows.name:
Every time she visit, she never fail to bring along
lovely foodstuffs and other gifts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0240
rows.name:
That why Omomo also do her best to repay
kindness with plenty of home-cooked snacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0250
rows.name: Tatsu could go for home-cooked snack also![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0280
rows.name:
As a matter of fact,
she's the one that asked us to come here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0300
rows.name: Kylie is one who speak to friends?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0330
rows.name:
Omomo has been burden on Kylie.
And also big burden on friends...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0360
rows.name: It is our job after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0370
rows.name:
In fact, since we're already here,
you can come with us to NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0380
rows.name: Omomo will be staying right here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0390
rows.name:
Apologies that friends had to come all this way.
Sorry for hassle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0420
rows.name: Hubbypon of Omomo rest peacefully here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0430
rows.name: That why Omomo also wish here to remain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0440
rows.name: But this planet's going to disappear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0460
rows.name: However, hubbypon always got lonely very easily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0480
rows.name: That why, Omomo cannot leave hubbypon here alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0510
rows.name:
Surely your husband wouldn't want you
to die here for him...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0530
rows.name: Even so, Omomo not asking friends to understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0540
rows.name: And how do you think Kylie will feel about this...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0580
rows.name:
Omomo... I can empathize with you about
wanting to stay with your loved one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0600
rows.name: Are you sure that's the only reason?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0640
rows.name: Omomo not wish to be burden to anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0670
rows.name:
To family. Two littlepon,
who have lots of littlepon also.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0680
rows.name: By now, they all safely in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0690
rows.name: Really? Then you should join them...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0710
rows.name: Often struggle to keep up with shenanigans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0720
rows.name:
When that happen, without fail everyone fuss,
and try to help out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0740
rows.name:
Making new life in new environment take lots
of effort and time. INCREDIBLE hassle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0760
rows.name:
And honestly, would hate to take away
time and effort from everypon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0770
rows.name: THAT'S what you call being a burden...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0800
rows.name:
Yes. Ready to meet own end here,
by side of hubbypon, peacefully.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0810
rows.name: That way, littlepon also then...surely happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0830
rows.name: Surely they'd be happier if you were with them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0840
rows.name: There's no reason for you not to impose on them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0860
rows.name: You can't just give up on living like this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0870
rows.name:
If you stay alive, you can support your family...
That's the real way to happiness...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_SEL0010
rows.name:
Say everyone should get to
decide for themselves.

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0910
rows.name: Let her be. It's her choice to stay behind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0930
rows.name:
Besides...it may seem cold, but there are others
out there who want to come to NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0970
rows.name: Let her be. It's her choice to stay behind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0980
rows.name: We can't move her by force.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG0990
rows.name:
Besides...it may seem cold, but there are others
out there who want to come to NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG1030
rows.name: Omomo, you've made your feelings clear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG1040
rows.name: Please, don't worry about your family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG1050
rows.name: I promise you. We'll get them safely to a new world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG1070
rows.name: And very sorry for making friends sad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG1090
rows.name: I'm sorry for speaking out of turn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG1110
rows.name: Friend did nothing of the sort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG1120
rows.name:
Omomo was happy that friend cared enough
to speak mind. Very lovely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG1170
rows.name: Omomo will not forget words of friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG1180
rows.name: Well... Let's get the news back to Kylie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32250100_MSG1240
rows.name: we must move forward, whatever the outcome.[ST:wait ]
